channel.title: What is the best way to advertise a server?
channel.description:
out of all the servers i run be they runescape tekkit or valve servers my major problem has always been players... what is the best way to advertise a server?
forums just don't seem to cut it... also im not afraid to spend a little cash in the proccess

item.title: What is the best way to advertise a server?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You have to realize that having an area for conventional communication and even documented updates is not enough to catch someone’s attention. It is harder than ever to get someone interested, so you will have to make sure you have a lot of things the best you can push them to be, including your team, grammar, dedication, knowledge, and sociability.

item.title: What is the best way to advertise a server?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

First, this should go in the general server discussion board.

[ul][li]Make only one advertisement thread per forums.[/li]
[li]Be professional, don’t make it a leech.[/li]
[li]Use unique content.[/li]
[li]Either spend much time with the project, or have a professional-looking, dedicated team.[/li]
[li]Don’t use webs.com or the such to have your website. Either make one yourself or have someone you know do it for you.[/li]
[li]If you’re willing to spend some cash, invest in some ads and sponsors. I would advise waiting for your game to take off before you actually invest in advertising with ads and sponsors.[/li]
[li]Have periodic promotional events, such as “How many friends can you get to join?”[/li][/ul]

Just a few. :rolleyes:
